dasa dahaye nottu pawa eda mudranaya kirimata siduwuye merata pawathi wideshiya banku bohomayakage ginum katayuthu pahasu kirima sandahaya.rupiyal wisse nottuwa mudranaya wanne 1979 diya.pansiyaya ha dahase nottu mudranaya wanne 1981 diya.me wana wita nottu pamanak lankawe mudranaya wana athara eya da engalanthaye thomas dilaro samagame shakhawakini. 1986 sita biyagama pihiti dilaro shakhawa apage nottu mudranaya karana athara adatath apage kasi achchu gasanne engalanthaye pihiti thomas dilaro maw shakhawayi.eheth lankawe mulma kasiya wana kahapana kasiya meratedima sakasunu bawata lankawe mila mudal gana liyawunu patha pothehi sandahanya.

ethek prabhu palanthiyata simawa thibu banku katayuthu gowi, kamkaru, lipikaru, guruwaru wani samanya panthiye minisuntada wiwrutha kirima sandaha 1961 juli 01 dina aarambha wu mahajana bankuwa, sirimawo bandaranayaka rajaye ti.bi. ilangarathna amathiwarayage mulikathwayen sthapitha kala ekak wiya.
ee siyalla muhude gili gambauru muhude pathule thanpathwa athi bawa wishwasa karanu labe.
honda ranga shilpiniyaka kiyana thana sita katayuthu kirima mage aramunayi.
“onna hodda rikandishan karala iwarayi.
tharamak sarala aakarayata kiyannenam me magin adahas karanne ahasa sparsha karana konkrit godanagili athara siya para soya gatha nohakiwa atharaman wu minisekuge athdakimayi.
40.1.1.-2 “muniwaraya hithawath dayaka gewal gane awidinta yanne na.

eeth malli siripade yanna aawe naha kiyala eyage yaluwo kiyanawa.”
